title: Basketball at the 2016 Summer Olympics – Men's team rosters
text: This article shows the rosters of all participating teams at the <a href="Basketball%20at%20the%202016%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20tournament">men's basketball tournament</a> at the <a href="2016%20Summer%20Olympics">2016 Summer Olympics</a> in <a href="Rio%20de%20Janeiro">Rio de Janeiro</a>.
